summary_detail.value: Smoke Forecast Outlook issued August 31, 2017 at 11:03 AM EDTOutlook for SunriseSmoke: A dry cold front will bring westerly winds and some relief from smoke as well as cooler morningtemperatures. Much of the forecast area will remain “Moderate” for Thursday, Missoula is the exception at"USG". Smoke is expected to filter back into valley locations overnight and remain through Friday morning.Fire: The Sunrise fire is located 11 miles SE of Superior, MT adjacent to I-90. A red flag warning is in effect. Minimalfire growth observed on the fire Wednesday. Increase in acreage is not expected on the Sunrise fire.Other: A Red Flag Warning for potential new lightning starts and gusty winds is in effect until 9pm tonight. Breezywest winds today following a weather disturbance bringing slightly cooler temperatures. Very hot and dry critical fireweather conditions remain. Expect an increase in fire behavior. Air quality has improved across the forecast areaand is expected to remain in the...

title: Smoke Forecast Outlook issued August 31, 2017 at 11:03 AM EDT (Burdette Fire Wildfire)
